# Copilot Instructions for codex_test

## Project Overview
This is a minimal HTML5 starter project containing basic HTML templates. The project currently consists of:
- `Untitled-1` - Markdown or plain text file containing HTML code block
- `Untitled-1.html` - HTML5 template file with basic document structure

## Architecture
The project is simple and single-file focused:
- No backend services or complex dependencies
- Standard HTML5 document structure with semantic elements (`<header>`, `<main>`)
- Mobile-responsive design ready (includes viewport meta tag)

## Key Patterns & Conventions

### HTML Standards
- Use semantic HTML5 elements: `<header>`, `<main>`, `<section>`, `<article>`, `<footer>`
- Always include charset (`<meta charset="UTF-8">`) and viewport meta tag for mobile responsiveness
- Keep document structure clean with proper heading hierarchy

### Content Recommendations
When extending this template:
1. Add CSS in `<style>` tag or link external stylesheets in `<head>`
2. Add JavaScript in `<script>` tags before closing `</body>` tag
3. Use semantic HTML - avoid excessive `<div>` elements

## Development Notes
- This is a template project - intended as a starting point for HTML projects
- No build process or package manager currently in use
- Files can be opened directly in browsers for immediate preview
- Consider renaming files from "Untitled-1" to meaningful names when expanding the project

## Common Tasks
- **View in browser**: Open `Untitled-1.html` directly in any web browser
- **Edit template**: Modify either file to add content, styles, or scripts
- **Version control**: Use git to track changes (repository is initialized)
